name: Aquamarine (itch) (Jfredd)
description: This is my first ever finished project made in Unity. Actually I lost motivation to continue fixing various bugs but I'm still proud of it given the fact that it took me a week to make. It's called Aquamarine but the color doesn't match up, it's stupid, but I didn't have any other ideas and this name sounds cool if you don't think about what it means. Anyways, it's a one minute experience but it does the job and fits with the jam's theme. It has no sounds whatsoever, sadly. I hope you enjoy it.
